items.name: Port Enablement
items.description: This setting controls the PCIe downstream port enablement.

items.name: Port [0] Lane Reversal
items.description: This setting allows the PCIe lanes to be reversed.

items.name: Port [2] Lane Reversal
items.description: This setting allows the PCIe lanes to be reversed.

items.name: Port [4] Lane Reversal
items.description: This setting allows the PCIe lanes to be reversed.

items.name: Port [8] Lane Reversal
items.description: This setting allows the PCIe lanes to be reversed.

items.name: Port [10] Lane Reversal
items.description: This setting allows the PCIe lanes to be reversed.

items.name: Custom Controller ID Enablement
items.description: This setting allows the PCIe Vendor ID and Device ID to be customized.

items.name: PCIe Controller Vendor ID
items.description: This setting configures the PCIe controller Vendor ID for all devices.

items.name: PCIe Upstream Port Device ID
items.description: This setting configures the PCIe Upstream port Device ID.

items.description: This setting configures the PCIe Gen4 Downstream port Device ID.

items.description: This setting configures the PCIe Gen3 Downstream port Device ID.

items.description: This setting configures the XHCI controller Device ID.
